pullRequest.title: Add metrics for JVM RCAs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
Add metrics for JVM RCAs. Metrics will be emitted whenever an unhealthy RCA is triggered.
Tests:
tested on docker
Code coverage percentage for this patch:
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

nodes.bodyText: We should re-use the graph metrics aggregator. Thoughts?
Do we not want metrics around HotNode RCA?

+
+import com.amazon.opendistro.elasticsearch.performanceanalyzer.rca.stats.eval.Statistics;

+import java.util.List;
+
+/**
+ * metrics added by each RCA vertex in RCA graph. All metrics under this category are
+ * RCA specific
+ */
+public enum RcaVerticesMetrics implements MeasurementSet {
